passage_text: Starting with the right cell phone. To connect to the internet with a cell phone, you need a cell phone that: 1  Is either Dual Mode or Tri Mode-To connect to the internet, you need a cell phone that works in digital format. 2  A dual mode phone is all digital and operates on two digital networks (1900 MHz and 800 MHz). Connecting your laptop to the internet using your cell phone can be surprisingly easy-if you have the right phone, the right cell service provider, and a simple connection cable. The good news is that the three major cell phone carriers in the US all make it relatively easy to connect.
